alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Meagher County Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:22PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Broadwater and south central Meagher Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 422 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of White Sulphur Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
